snippet.title: Rogue Spirit - Launch Trailer (PEGI)
snippet.description:
The Kingdom of Midra needs you!

Rogue Spirit is a 3D rogue-lite action game with light stealth elements. Play as the Ghost of the Prince of the Kingdom of Midra, possessing enemies and absorb their unique skills to fight the evil presence that has corrupted the land.

🎮 Available now in Early Access on Steam: http://505.games/RogueSpiritOutNowYT
👾 Join the Discord: http://505.games/RogueSpiritDiscord

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
